main event: A UFO sighting occurred in Mitio AB, Japan on 9th August 1954, involving a brilliant white object observed for 8 seconds moving laterally at 14,000 feet before disappearing behind a cloud layer. The report concludes that the sighting remains unidentified.
interesting points: The UFO was observed by Japanese military personnel and had a metallic appearance.
The object changed direction and speed several times during its observation.
It disappeared from view to the south and reappeared several minutes later, then proceeded to increase speed and altitude before disappearing from view.
Witnesses described the object as a round spot of intense white light about four times the diameter of the Big Dipper star group.
The witness was contacted and informed that the object he had seen could be explained as a normal natural phenomenon, and the case was closed with the conclusion of other normal explanation.
sighted object: brilliant white object moving laterally at 14,000 feet
